content:
## Updating

To update your n8n instance to the `latest` version, run:

```bash
npm update -g n8n
```

To install the `next` version:

```bash
npm install -g n8n@next
```

--8<-- "_snippets/self-hosting/installation/tunnel.md"

Start n8n with `--tunnel` by running:

```bash
n8n start --tunnel
```
